prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that has a playful expression and long, flowing appendages.
Imagine a small, blue Pokemon with round features and a cute, friendly demeanor.
Generate a mythical creature that can manipulate water and has a shimmering blue appearance.
Show me a Pokemon that looks like it belongs in the ocean, with a soft, rounded body.
Design a charming Pokemon with aquatic traits, featuring long tentacle-like arms and a gentle smile.
Give me a legendary Pokemon that embodies the essence of the sea, with vibrant blue colors.
Make a unique Pokemon that is both enchanting and elusive, with a whimsical design.
